content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position (0, 0)) with an inventory containing coal and no ingredients to smelt.

### Furnace at position(2, 0)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position (2, 0)) with an inventory containing coal and producing copper-plate.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to craft items without required machines
- Ensure you have the necessary crafting machines or furnaces available to craft items. For example, iron-plate requires a crafting machine or a furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces without sufficient inventory
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. For instance, ensure you have coal before trying to insert it into a furnace.

### Errors when inserting items into entities that cannot accept them
- Verify that the target entity can accept the items you are trying to insert. If an entity cannot accept a certain item, you will receive an error indicating that it cannot find a nearby entity that can accept the item.
